name: Cosmic Worm (Bubo4400, ySeiker)
description:
Have you the courage to be a Cosmic Worm? Take the control, eat stars and evolve the creature.

________________________________

Movement:

The worm follows your mouse

_________________________________

Stars :

Yellow star : 1 point

Red star :  5 points

Super giant red star : 10 points

Bleu star : 15 points

White dwarf : 20 points

Gamma ray burst : 100 points

And in addition a 2x star that last 10 seconds once picked up

_________________________________

We couldn't  manage to get a natural movement to the snake and there is no sound in the settings but the sound toggle does work.

Press spacebar to pause the game.
